author: Manu P Toms
title: Exclusive: Portea in talks to buy Medybiz Pharma
text:
| 0 Comments K Ganesh, chairman of Portea 
Health Vista Pvt Ltd, which provides home healthcare services under the brand Portea, is in advanced talks to acquire Medybiz Pharma Pvt Ltd, a company that delivers critical drugs at patientsâ€™ doorsteps, a person familiar with the development said. 
Click here for full story.
